form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DOONGARWADI RECEIPT NO. 193, OFFICE OF THE TRUSTEES OF THE PARSI PUNCHAYET FUNDS & PROPERTIES

full_text: Seri in. 716 DOONGARWADI RECEIPT No. 193 OFFICE OF THE TRUSTEES OF THE PARSI PUNCHAYET FUNDS & PROPERTIES MADAM/SIR, Bai Frenymai Hormusji Jamasji Irani Your husband Hermusji Jamasji Irani aged 73 died at Patel Chambers, No.19 Counbew Street Fort, Bombay residing at -Do- on 1st March 1972 Roz 5 , Mah , 134/1 Yazdezerdi and her/his body was consigned to the Tower of Silence in our charge on 1st March 1972. You have paid Rs. 32/ for her/his funeral charges and this receipt is passed to you for the same. 209, Dr. D. N. Road, Fort, Bombay. Kharshedin Damania GUSTASP PIROJSHAW ANTIA Collecting Clerk. Jt. Secretary The above is an English rendering of the Gujarati receipt given at Doongarwadi. A fee of Re. has been received for issuing same. 209, Dr. Dadabhai Naoroji Road, Bombay 6th March 1979. Jt. Secretary As death has occurred after roldnight there has been a change in the Corresponding Murhan date
